channel.title: How do i keep my screen and everything running?
channel.description:
Yeah well, When I'm sleeping after less than a hour my computer automatically shuts down. When it shuts down my autoer stops and I usually have only gained 1k of the ore I'm mining. But when I tape one of my buttons on my keyboard to keep it on it usually works *I only tried this once because I was getting pissed*, Does anyone know a way i can get it to work without taping a piece of the keyboard... I only have 2 keyboards and I don't wanna ruin this one.
Anyways if theres a manual way to stop this, I need a bit of help, I run on Windows Vista,
Thanks, -John

item.title: How do i keep my screen and everything running?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Oh well maybe he should just change the auto turn off time

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep my screen and everything running?

item.title: How do i keep my screen and everything running?
item.dc:creator: @K0_D3ni3d K0 D3ni3d™
item.description:
@K0_D3ni3d wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:7, topic:189478”]I do not know how to get there in vista,

But in windows XP you go to the control panel, and click on power options. There’s a few things there that allow you to turn off certain things after an amount of time.[/quote]

I’ll look, it should be there hopefully.

Also i left my computer on 3 hours Stand
by and when I got back there was not one thing done from when I left. But when I got back on it started doing its Job.

Edit: I found it JME I’ll test it later. I set it instead of turning off the screen every 20minutes, and turning off the computer every hour to 1hour screeen and 3hours computer. xD

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep my screen and everything running?

item.title: How do i keep my screen and everything running?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I do not know how to get there in vista,

But in windows XP you go to the control panel, and click on power options. There’s a few things there that allow you to turn off certain things after an amount of time.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i keep my screen and everything running?

item.title: How do i keep my screen and everything running?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“K0 D3ni3d™, post:5, topic:189478”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=252388.msg2110754#msg2110754 date=1205613027]

If I did that it may still shut down… If i leave it alone for to long it’ll shut down.

And I think i tried stand by once, i’ll try again later.

Thanks for the quick response o.O

Standby is supposed to keep your computer running what ever you have on until you come back and do something. Start>TurnOff>StandBy
[/quote]
Ok…it should work
Okay thanks, Hopefully it works because I coud swore I tried it >.<

Ima take a nap to see :p[/quote]

Read full topic
